attributes.title: bad cheeto
attributes.review: This is the most horrible app I’ve ever downloaded. I expected more from the President of The United States. The design of the app, terrible. The font used in the app, unreadable. The pictures used, horrible. The buttons are so difficult to manage! I am absolutely disappointed for this app. Be a better president and a better cheeto.

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: So I got this app but immediately after downloading my phone began to glitch and the screen kept turning off and it didn’t stop until I took the app off of my phone. It’s so strange never had something like this happen to my phone before. Definitely wouldn’t recommend!

I bought the app hoping to god I could get paid money to keep quiet about a trump scandal however no such thing happened. I thought I could at least get a job on his team cus apparently they let anyone in but again to no avail dissatisfied to the max and I wish I could jus give it a 0 star review.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app in hopes of educating myself on Trump’s future plans and ideas, but the app was too hard to navigate😿. I am very frustrated because I was looking forward to this experience, but the app was not worth it. The app definitely needs improvements. Please take my comment into consideration. 
love, gen z😌💅

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to stay connected with our ✨orange🍊President, but it was a disappointment. The app kept crashing. The information from the app was not helpful🧚🏼at all. It deserves -5/5 stars but unfortunately I can only give it one star. Don’t download this app, please and thank you. Have a fairy magical day🧚🏼✨🧚🏼💕😘

attributes.title: i made a ✨mistake✨
attributes.review: in an attempt to discover this beautiful orange’s talented speaking and obvious perfect posture 〰️, i downloaded this app. i was told that by downloading this app i would meet the love of my life, then three weeks later i was i given a baby with my crushes fathers cousin of marriage. i wasn’t allowed to get rid of the baby due to my commitment to the racist, fascist, and misogynistic god 🍊trump🍊. i now drive a mini van with 7 kids in the van, while strictly listening to ed sheeran, consistently keeping my haircut as a bob cut, and my name just happens to be karen now. it’s a good life🌜😱👻🎣👁👄👁 please do not download this app

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: The app has a poor design and interface. It either freezes and kicks you out after a few minutes into opening it. Not to mention it was created by a terrible man. Time to take out the trash and have this app removed from your store.

attributes.title: Trying to steal my data?
attributes.review:
I’m worried that that this app is being used to steal my private information, which means it NEEDS to be shut down. I can’t think of a single other app that does that, and that’s big scary. 

Until you guys can guarantee my safety and privacy, I’m going to need you to get rid of this app.

attributes.title: Highly disappointed
attributes.review: Downloaded the app thinking it would be GREAT! The GREATEST, BIGGEST app of them all. Unfortunately, when I went looking for all of our president’s amazing future plans for the economy and the country in general, it was not to be found! I think the app must be faulty because all I found was a Cheeto commercial :((

attributes.title: This app is disgustANG pls take it down.
attributes.review: I got the app to see what all the fuss was about🥰 little did I know when I opened the app ... I saw something so wrong and I wouldn’t wand my children seeing it. It’s terrible but I’m not a bully but whoever was on that screen I pray. Anyway I don’t appreciate this app being up it was not cool. Take it down please.
